change.changenote: Regulation BEFORE repealed by BC Reg 139/2014, effective July 2, 2014.

bcl:section.bcl:text: The following area of land, under the administration of the Minister of Environment, is designated as Green Mountain Wildlife Management Area and then as a Critical Wildlife Management Area:
That part of Block 1392, Dunsmuir District, lying within the following described boundaries:

Commencing at a point on the westerly boundary of Block 1392, said point shown as O.I.P. 5 on plan of Block 1392 on file in the Surveys and Lands Branch, Ministry of Lands and Parks, Victoria; thence 75° 00'00" a distance of 1 100 metres more or less to Triangulation Station "Green", being the summit of Green Mountain; thence 160° 00'00" a distance of 1 000 metres more or less to a point on the southerly boundary of Block 1392, said point being 900.0 metres more or less west of the most easterly southeast corner; thence east to said corner; thence following the easterly, northerly and westerly boundaries of Block 1392 in a northerly, westerly, northerly, westerly, northerly, westerly, northerly, westerly, southerly, westerly, southerly, easterly, southerly and easterly direction to the aforementioned point of commencement.

reg:content.reg:provisionsnote: [Provisions of the Wildlife Act, R.S.B.C. 1996, c. 488, relevant to the enactment of this regulation: sections 4, 5 (1)]
